document.full_text: johnny damon struck his second walk-off hit against minnesota in three days to give the tampa bay rays a 4-3 win over the twins on saturday.
document.title: tampa's damon downs twins again with late rally
lines_and_colors: johnny damon struck his second walk-off hit against minnesota in three days to give the tampa bay rays a 4-3 win over the twins on saturday.
